summary: Completed comprehensive testing of RestfulMind information website. Backend APIs fully functional (18/18 tests passed). Frontend navigation, admin panel, and content display working excellently. Minor UI issue with newsletter signup checkbox interaction.

ui_bugs.issue: GDPR consent checkbox not clickable due to element overlay interception
ui_bugs.details: Span element intercepts pointer events preventing checkbox interaction

design_issues.issue: Related articles section not found on article pages

passed_tests: Homepage loads with all sections (hero, featured, categories, newsletter)
Navigation menu works for all category links
Admin articles management (15 articles with CRUD interface)
Admin categories management (6 categories with edit/delete)
Legal pages load correctly (Privacy, Terms, Disclaimer, Contact)
Article pages load with content and reading progress bar
Newsletter form elements present (email input, submit button)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix newsletter signup checkbox interaction issue - remove or adjust element overlay that prevents GDPR consent checkbox from being clickable
